description: Learn how to make this quick and easy cauliflower cheese recipe. Ready in 30 minutes, it’s the perfect addition to your next midweek dinner.
keywords: Cauliflower bake,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Video,Low sugar,Quick & easy,Halal,Soy free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Baked Cauliflower Cheese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a small pot over medium-high heat. Add the flour and stir for 1 minute. Add milk and heat until almost boiling. Whisk in mozzarella, mustard and nutmeg.

Arrange cauliflower slices in an ovenproof baking dish and pour over the cheese mixture. Sprinkle with extra mozzarella and parmesan and bake for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve as a side dish.
